Articles.Content:
o/ hiii my name is Molfy, and I am new to the forums. I’ve been reading the KSP forums since I started KSP in about 2019, but never made a forums account. Anyhow, multiple years later here I am! Yaaay! I think I’ve got about 200 hours in the game. I mostly play modded.

I am also an indie game dev(I use the unity engine), and I am looking to get into creating graphics mods for KSP using shaders I’ve developed in Unity!

Also, Val told me to tell you hi from her lone habitation module that was blown off the side of the Jool space station when a violent inter-spatial rift opened. 

Byeee!
Howdy. Your mods will be greatly appreciated.
Welcome, and may your modding efforts be fruitful!
